Description: Pottery ostrakon inscribed in Greek with a receipt of poll-tax.
Curator's comments: For the text, see Harrauer and Sijpesteijn 1983, 52-3 no. 3. Bibliography: Harrauer, H and Sijpesteijn, P.J. 1983, ‘Drei ostraka aus der sammlung Moen’, Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists 20, No. 1/2, 49-54.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Charles Ede Ltd (See sale catalogue, Writing and letter in antiquity XII (1988), no. 26b)
